00047 Polynomial::~Polynomial(){
00048   term * t;
00049   while(polynomial){
00050     t = polynomial;
00051     polynomial = t->next;
00052     delete t;
00053   }
00054 }

00061 void Polynomial::insert(term * t){
00062   term * u = polynomial;
00063   term * prev = NULL;
00064   while(u->next && ( t->deg > u->deg)){
00065     prev = u;
00066     u = u->next;
00067   }
00068   if (u == polynomial && !(t->deg >= u->deg)){
00069     //still at head of list, and t is not bigger
00070     polynomial = t;
00071     t->next = u;
00072   }  else if (t->deg > u->deg){
00073     // got to end of list
00074     u->next = t;
00075   }
00076   else {
00077     // in the middle
00078     t->next = u;;
00079     if(prev)
00080       prev->next = t;
00081     else polynomial = t;
00082   }
00083   reduce();
00084   return;
00085 }
00086 
00088 void Polynomial::insert(double coef=0, unsigned deg=0){
00089   term * t = new term(coef, deg);
00090   insert(t);
00091   return;
00092 }

00094 Polynomial& Polynomial::operator+=(Polynomial const &other)
00095 {
00096   Polynomial tmp(*this);
00097   term * t = other.polynomial;
00098   while(t){
00099     tmp.insert(t->coef,t->deg);
00100     t=t->next;
00101   }
00102   swap(tmp);
00103   return *this;
00104 }

00114 
00116 double Polynomial::operator()
00117   (double a) const
00118 {
00119   Polynomial p;
00120   term *t, *u;
00121   unsigned degree;
00122   double result = 0;
00123   // first reverse order the list
00124   // since the polynomial is sorted,
00125   // just peel off to the front each time.
00126   t = polynomial;
00127   while (t){
00128     u =  p.polynomial;
00129     p.polynomial = new term(*t);
00130     t = t->next;
00131     p.polynomial->next = u;
00132   }
00133   // seed with the highest order term
00134   t = p.polynomial;
00135   degree = t->deg;
00136   // now evaluate the polynomial at a
00137   while(t){
00138     // multiply result by a
00139     while(degree > t->deg){
00140       result *= a;
00141       degree--;
00142     }
00143     // add next coefficient
00144     result += t->coef;
00145     //remember depth (there might be gaps)
00146     degree = t->deg;
00147     // advance
00148     t = t->next;
00149   }
00150   return result;
00151 }
00152 
00153 Polynomial Polynomial::operator*
00154 (const Polynomial & rhs) const {
00155   // for each term in rhs
00156   // multiply terms by coef and raise power by deg
00157   Polynomial p;
00158   term * u;
00159   term * t = rhs.polynomial;
00160   while (t) {
00161     u = polynomial;
00162     while(u){
00163       p.insert(u->coef * t->coef, u->deg + t->deg);
00164       u = u->next;
00165     }
00166     t = t->next;
00167   }
00168   return p;
00169 }

00196 Polynomial Polynomial::derivative() const {
00197   Polynomial p;
00198   term *t = polynomial;
00199   while(t){
00200     if(t->deg)
00201       p.insert((t->coef * t->deg), t->deg - 1);
00202     t = t->next;
00203   }
00204   return p;
00205 }
00209 Polynomial derivative(const Polynomial & p){
00210   return p.derivative();

00213 Polynomial Polynomial::abs() const{
00214   Polynomial tmp(*this);
00215   term *t = tmp.polynomial;
00216   while(t){
00217     if (t->coef <  0)
00218       t->coef *= -1;
00219     t = t->next;
00220   }
00221   return tmp;
00222 }

00230 Polynomial Polynomial::antiderivative() const {
00231   Polynomial p;
00232   term *t = polynomial;
00233   while(t){
00234     if(t->deg == 0)
00235       p.insert(t->coef, 1);
00236     else
00237       p.insert( t->coef /(1.0+ t->deg), t->deg+1);
00238     t=t->next;
00239   }
00240   return p;
00241 }
00245 Polynomial antiderivative(const Polynomial & p) {
00246   return p.antiderivative();
00247 }
00249 void Polynomial::swap(Polynomial &other)
00250 {
00251   char buffer[sizeof(Polynomial)];
00252   memcpy(buffer, &other, sizeof(Polynomial));
00253   memcpy(&other, this,   sizeof(Polynomial));
00254   memcpy(this,   buffer, sizeof(Polynomial));
00255 }

00259 Polynomial& Polynomial::operator=(const Polynomial & rhs){
00260   if(this != &rhs){
00261     Polynomial tmp(rhs);
00262     swap(tmp);
00263   }
00264  return *this;
00265 }

00268 Polynomial::Polynomial(const Polynomial& rhs){
00269   term * t;
00270   // initialize
00271   polynomial = new term();
00272   // copy
00273   t = rhs.polynomial;
00274   while(t){
00275     insert(t->coef, t->deg);
00276     t = t->next;
00277   }
00278 }

00285 void Polynomial::reduce(){
00286   term * t = polynomial;
00287   term * tmp;
00288   if(t != NULL)
00289     while((t != NULL) && (t->next != NULL)){
00290       //combine like terms
00291       if(t->deg == t->next->deg){
00292     tmp = t->next;
00293     t->coef += tmp->coef;
00294     t->next = tmp->next;
00295     // remove redundant terms
00296     delete tmp;
00297       }
00298       // move forward
00299       if(t)
00300     t = t->next;
00301     } // while next is not null
00302   return;
00303 }

00309 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Polynomial& p){
00310   Polynomial::term * t;
00311   t = p.polynomial;
00312   bool first = true;
00313   while(t){
00314     if(t->coef != 0.0){
00315       if(!first)
00316     os<<" + ";
00317 
00318       os<< t->coef;
00319       if(t->deg){
00320     os<<"*x";
00321     if(t->deg > 1)
00322       os<<"^"<<t->deg;
00323       }
00324       //    os<<" ";
00325     first = false;
00326    }
00327     t = t->next;
00328 
00329   }
00330   if (first)
00331     os<<"0";
00332   return os;
00333 }

00340 std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, Polynomial &p){
00341   double coef;
00342   unsigned int  degree;
00343   Polynomial::term *t;
00344   coef = 0.0;
00345   while (coef == 0.0){
00346     is>>coef;
00347     is>>degree;
00348     if(!is.fail()){
00349       t = new Polynomial::term(coef, degree);
00350       p.insert(t);
00351     }
00352   }
00353   return is;
00354 }
